content.query:
create  PROC  [SP_MergeSalesforcetoGoldLayer]  
  as

  Begin


CREATE TABLE dbo.#TempTable
    (
     [doc] nvarchar(4000) 
    )
WITH
    (    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
     CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
     -- HEAP
    )
GO
;
COPY INTO dbo.#TempTable  
 
	FROM 'https://nithindatalakestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/poc/salesforce/jsonfiles/'
	WITH (
      
		FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
		,fieldterminator ='0x0b'
        ,fieldquote = '0x0b'
        ,rowterminator = '0x0A'  /* Override This if a Json document and not single object */
		,CREDENTIAL=(IDENTITY= 'Managed Identity')        
	)
    ;
 
  with SalesForceJsonData_CT 
   as  ( 
SELECT  
  JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.id') AS id, 
  JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.name') AS name,
  JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.username') AS username,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.email') AS email,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.address.street') AS street,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.address.suite') AS suite,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.address.zipcode') AS zipcode,
    JSON_VALUE(doc,'$.address.geo.lat') as Lat,
    JSON_VALUE(doc,'$.address.geo.lng') as lng,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.phone') AS phone,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.website') AS website,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.company.name') AS companyname,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.company.catchPhrase') AS catchPhrase,
   JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.company.bs') AS bs   
FROM dbo.#TempTable)


MERGE into [gold].[SalesForceJsonData] AS TARGET
USING SalesForceJsonData_CT AS id 
ON (TARGET.id = SOURCE.BusinessEntityID) 
--When records are matched, update the records if there is any change
WHEN MATCHED -----AND TARGET.ProductName <> SOURCE.ProductName OR TARGET.Rate <> SOURCE.Rate 
THEN UPDATE SET
TARGET.name=SOURCE.name,
TARGET.username=SOURCE.username,
TARGET.email=SOURCE.email,
TARGET.street=SOURCE.street,
TARGET.suite=SOURCE.suite,
TARGET.zipcode=SOURCE.zipcode,
TARGET.Lat=SOURCE.Lat,
TARGET.lng=SOURCE.lng ,
TARGET.phone=SOURCE.phone ,
TARGET.website=SOURCE.website ,
TARGET.companyname=SOURCE.companyname ,
TARGET.catchPhrase=SOURCE.catchPhrase ,
TARGET.bs=SOURCE.bs 
--When no records are matched, insert the incoming records from source table to target table
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET 
THEN INSERT (id,name,username,email,street,suite,zipcode,Lat,lng,phone,website,companyname,catchPhrase,bs) 
VALUES (
Source.id,
Source.name,
Source.username,
Source.email,
Source.street,
Source.suite,
Source.zipcode,
Source.Lat,
Source.lng,
Source.phone,
Source.website,
Source.companyname,
Source.catchPhrase,
Source.bs)
 
/* 3. Performing the DELETE operation */
 
    /* When no records are matched with SOURCE table
       Then delete the records from the target table */
    WHEN NOT MATCHED BY SOURCE
    THEN DELETE;

	END
